author: Nerdstalgic
description:
Zack Snyder’s Snyderverse had a divisive run, but one thing most fans agree on is that Ben Affleck’s Batman was a standout in the DCEU. With his gritty portrayal of the Dark Knight, many were eager to see his solo Batman movie come to life.  But as the DCEU crumbled, Affleck’s vision for The Batman was scrapped, making way for Robert Pattinson’s rebooted version instead. 

So what exactly would a Ben Affleck Solo Batman project have looked like?  Could it have saved the DCEU from extinction, or is it best to leave the past behind and move forward?

💬 Let us know your thoughts in the comments!

👍 Like, subscribe, and hit the bell for more deep dives into superhero films and the DCEU!

#batman  #benaffleck  #thebatman  #dceu  #dccomics
title: The Version Of Ben Affleck's Batman We Never Got To See
